name: The Lost Roots
description:
You are the Tree of Life -- old, wise and powerful. Using your supernatural senses, you know that the ancient evil lying deep underground is about to reawaken and return to the surface. The tip of your magical glowing root is the only thing that can reach the depths in time, and crush the evil being while it is still weak. Just don't get lost, or hit anything on the way down there.

This game was made as part of Global Game Jam 2023 in Helsinki, Finland.

Kalle Hahtela -- Code
Ilmari Töyrylä -- Audio
Petri Ranta -- Project manager & writer
Samu Harno -- Background Art
Sonja Helin -- Obstacle and UI Art
